Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-2006 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 16.12-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-2006 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 16.12-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postgresql is earlier than 16.12-1, affected by CVE-2026-2006
